author: Kevin Stratvert
description:
In this video, I break down what Vibe Coding is for beginners, how it works, and how you can build real applications using AI with tools like Base44.
👉 Start building your app with Base44:  https://base44.kevinstratvert.com
💡 Use the code Kevin10 to get extra credits when signing up!

Vibe Coding is changing how people build apps — and you don’t need to be a traditional programmer to get started. If you’ve ever wanted to create software, dashboards, or internal tools without writing thousands of lines of code, this video is for you.

In this video, you’ll learn:
- What Vibe Coding actually means
- How AI translates your ideas into working app logic
- Why Vibe Coding is different from traditional coding and no-code tools
- How beginners can build apps using Base44
- Real examples of AI handling workflows, logic, and UI updates

This walkthrough is perfect for beginners, non-developers, entrepreneurs, business owners, and anyone curious about how AI is changing software development.

Ho
title: What Is Vibe Coding? The New Way People Are Building Apps With AI
